  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(int loanNumber, String accountNumber, LocalDate dateOfLoan, double amount, boolean pending, boolean isDeclined)
      Parameters:
      loanNumber - the loan number containing the current count of the loan.
      accountNumber - the account number that made the loan.
      dateOfLoan - the date when the loan is processed.
      amount - the amount that was loan.
      pending - if the loan is not yet resolved.
      isDeclined - if true the loan is declined, otherwise false.

    • Loan

      public Loan(String accountNumber, LocalDate dateOfLoan, double amount, boolean pending)
      record for making a loan.
      Parameters:

      dateOfLoan - the date when the loan is processed.
      amount - the amount that was loan.
      pending - if the loan is not yet resolved.

      accountNumber - the account number that made the loan.
      pending - if the loan is not yet resolved.
      isDeclined - if loan is declined.
